column4: hey people, i've been trying to install ubuntu for the fifth time now from a live CD on my DESKTOP. whenever i finish and reboot it doesn't load X but goes to a console mode where i can do nothing actually. any reason or solution?
you can't login or type anything in the console ?
i can use few commands but nothing helps
and cant login root or a thing
you can't even log in as root ? ,
weird . all of my installs have been successful ..
and when i start ubuntu it takes like ten mins to load. even to console mode
can you login as the user you made in the installation process ?
cant use login or su commands
maybe the burn failed or something ?
should i try to download the file again and try to reinstall? but didn't help before..
checked it three times actually and was all good
have you tried booting it up in recovery mode ?
when i do that it gets stuck in some level then nothing happens.. and i actually have a super machine over here
no idea whats up with this installation
then I don't know what could be wrong :s , sorry but I don't think I can help you .
thanks alot dude.. hopefully ill make it run sometime..
